website_summaries.verdict: Named for basketball icon and created by a trusted manufacturer, this casual, sporty slip-on is comfortable and stylish.
pros: Flexible rubber midsole, classic Converse diamond-pattern rubber outsole, sturdy canvas upper
Laces removable to personalize your look
Secure elastic collar with heel pull tab
Signature features include rubber toe box, textured toe bumper, contrasting color sidewall trim, ventilation portholes, and All-Star heel patch

website_summaries.verdict: A comfortable shoe with a feminine look not found in the unisex Converse line. Great for casual or athletic wear.
pros: Elastic collar makes them easy to slip on
Laces are fixed in place so you don't have to worry about tying them
Low cut around the ankle gives them a nice feminine touch
cons: Narrow fit and run about a half-size large

customer_reviews.title: So cute!
customer_reviews.text: I had several converse Tennies but when I saw these at Marshall's I knew I had to have them. But they had one in my size and could not find the other! So happy I found them on Amazon. My package came quicker then expected! I got a size 7 and I feel like they are a tad bit roomier then the regular converse.
customer_reviews.author: Suzi Linthorst

customer_reviews.title: Cute converse
customer_reviews.text: Shoes can be a little tight at first but once you wear them in then shouldn’t be a problem. Really cute shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie C

customer_reviews.title: cute for big feet!
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes! I have 3 pair and plan on getting more. I have size 10 feet and they don't look like boats.
customer_reviews.author: Lara

customer_reviews.title: Good quality shoe
customer_reviews.text: Fit was a little narrow at first. They’ve relaxed after re-lacing and general wear. Definitely recommend if you want a cute but also well made shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Lily

customer_reviews.title: Its ok
customer_reviews.text: Too small. I had to break in after using for months. Lol
customer_reviews.author: Ako Si Andeng

customer_reviews.title: A bit small but I kept them.
customer_reviews.text: For some reason this particular color fits smaller than the other converse sneakers that I have ordered. A little small but I still wear them hoping that they will stretch out a little bit overtime.
customer_reviews.author: Irishlady

customer_reviews.title: Not comfy
customer_reviews.text: Not comfortable at the opening where it’s scrunched up. Can’t wear for longer time at all.
customer_reviews.author: Tynka

customer_reviews.title: Too tight!
customer_reviews.text: I read the reviews and some said they were too tight. Well, I have a thin foot so I figured I would be fine. I usually wear a size 6 so I ordered a 6 in these and they were too big in the length but so tight up by the top of my foot that I could barely get my foot in! I was very disappointed. Once I got my foot in, it was so tight I couldn’t even walk it pure hurt! I will say they were cute, but I wouldn’t recommend these, very uncomfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Wife&momof5

customer_reviews.title: Stylish & comfy for someone with problem feet.
customer_reviews.text: Great product. No rubbing on the toes or heel. I have serious problem feet and these fit great.
customer_reviews.author: Stefanie E.

customer_reviews.title: Love them as usual!
customer_reviews.text: I am a huge fan of shorelines and have a big selection. However, they are inconsistent now adays on shoe size and fit, no matter where I buy them. So I never know whether to get my usual 6 1/2 size or 7. That's the only downfall.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love these!
customer_reviews.text: These fit way better than the classic Converse. However I wouldn’t recommend if you have a wider foot.
customer_reviews.author: Erika

customer_reviews.title: A bit small , no half size up
customer_reviews.text: Love the color and design .. but was a bit small .. the problem is there is no half size up .. but overall looks nice .. just not for long walks
customer_reviews.author: noora

customer_reviews.title: Nice slip on easy shoe
customer_reviews.text: Unique color, great slip on ability. Much more narrow in toe box than expected abd I have a medium to narrow foot.
customer_reviews.author: Magen

customer_reviews.title: So nope not an owner of chuck's like I had
customer_reviews.text: very narrow. I was so upset. I went to buy a bigger size and it was twice the price. So nope not an owner of chuck's like I had hoped
customer_reviews.author: Stacy I.

customer_reviews.title: Cute, but no cigar for me.
customer_reviews.text: They are very cute, just not the right fit for my chubby feet!
customer_reviews.author: KidSister

customer_reviews.title: I liked it.
customer_reviews.text: Loved the colour. Made the top of my feet sore.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome pair of shoes 👌
customer_reviews.text: Hated that I had to pay so much but could not anywhere find this color and in my size glad I made the purchase there were only two left and I got one of them😊
customer_reviews.author: Christina W.

customer_reviews.title: Love love love this style- the elastic is not tight ...
customer_reviews.text: Love love love this style- the elastic is not tight enough on one foot, so I had to undo the lacing from the last eyelet to tie them. Works perfectly!
customer_reviews.author: Michaela Callahan

customer_reviews.title: Used shoes
customer_reviews.text: These shoes had scuff marks on the toes and the bottom soles look like they’ve been worn before. There’s also animal hairs on the bottom of the shoes. Very disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Natalie Steele

customer_reviews.title: Run big
customer_reviews.text: Love these but they are too big and disappointed the size I need is unavailable.
customer_reviews.author: Julie

customer_reviews.title: Be aware of knock offs!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these shoes on 12/24/18 and received them shortly after only to receive knockoffs. I wouldn't have noticed if I did not read the other reviews where people said there should be a star in the "O" on the sole of the sneaker and the tongue. I quickly returned them and purchased the same pair for the same price elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: What color should I order next?
customer_reviews.text: These are exactly what I wanted. Slender and dainty enough for capri pants but durable, rugged and easy to clean up. This new style is snug to your foot so order the right size. I’m a small sz 8 and if I wanted a to wear a thicker sock I could have sized up a little but they feel great with my hideaway socks.
customer_reviews.author: CRC

customer_reviews.title: Not charcoal. They are Taupe.
customer_reviews.text: The only reason I'm giving these 3 stars is because they are very comfortable. I ordered the "charcoal" color shoes and they should definitely change the name of the color to TAUPE, not charcoal. The picture I posted is one shoe on a taupe sweater and one on a light gray (I do not have a charcoal sweater). But if anyone knows anything about taupe they should know that it is a brown-gray color. On the light gray sweater you can even see that the shoe does somewhat look grayish.
customer_reviews.author: Sabrina R

customer_reviews.title: NOT CONVERSE!!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these 'converse' sneakers as a gift. It turned out to be a fake brand NOT CONVERSE. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Converse Women's Chuck Taylor All Star Shoreline Slip Sneaker
product_meta.description: The Converse Shoreline is the perfect, feminine-cut sneaker to take to the beach, park or wherever your warm weather adventures take you. They feature a slip-on closure with an elastic collar, pull loop and fixed laces for a nice snug fit.
feature_bullets: Canvas upper in a slip-on style
Lace up design with elasticized collar for easy on and off fit
Striped rubber midsole with textured toe bumper
Made with a rubber outsole that provide aditional ground traction
Fixed laces. Features medial eyelets and no tie design
